description: This file defines a Flutter widget named GestureBoardContainer that wraps a child widget with gesture detection logic to handle swipe gestures. It detects swipe directions (left, right, up, down) and triggers corresponding move methods on a GameProvider, facilitating user interaction in a 2048 game implementation.

classes.name: GestureBoardContainer
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that detects swipe gestures (horizontal and vertical drags) and calls move methods on GameProvider accordingly.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds a GestureDetector wrapping the child widget and assigns gesture callbacks.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Handles the start of a drag gesture, recording the initial position.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Handles ongoing drag updates; determines swipe direction based on displacement and triggers move methods.

methods.name: onEnd
methods.description: Resets gesture state upon gesture end or cancellation.
